attributes.action: Stop the closure of Press TV on Sky Digital.
attributes.additional_details: To stop ofcom's decision of the closure of Press TV on Sky Digital. Freedom of speech cannot be attained in the U.K; Hypocrites, tyrants and corporate companies try to control everything we do and say. For many of us Press TV tells us key issues around the world, has information days before other news channels and is not biased towards any topic but it only tells the truth and nothing but the truth.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Ofcom.
